mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Sandis, John S.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Berlin PO Sommerset Co., Penn [Berlin PO Sommerset County, Pennsylvania]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Sandis, John S. Patient Age: 22. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot wound right arm. Location Wounded: Accidental. Date Wounded: 1864/03/17. Nature of Wound: Conical ball . Result: Cured and returned to duty October 17th 1864.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Sandis, John S.
Gun shot wound right arm
Private
E
54 Penn Inf [54th Pennsylvania Volunteer Infantry]
Pennsylvania
Hospital Number 3232
